Tribute Page

Dr. (H.C.) Ir. H. Soekarno

The first president of Indonesia

Picture of Dr. (H.C.) Ir. H. Soekarno

Here's a time line Dr. (H.C.) Ir. H. Soekarno's life:

  • 1901 - Born in Soerabaja, Dutch East Indies
  • 1945 - Proclaiming the independence of Indonesia
  • 1945 - Become the first president of Indonesia
  • 1967 - End of office as president of Indonesia
  • 1970 - Dies at age of 69

If you have time, you should read more about Dr. (H.C.) Ir. H. Soekarno on Wikipedia entry.
